edge: In the movie, Hrithik Roshan portrays the character Arjun Saluja.
Abhay Deol plays the role of Kabir Dewan in the movie.
In this film, Farhan Akhtar acts as Imran Qureshi.
Katrina Kaif essays the character of Laila in the movie.
In the film, Kalki Koechlin enacts the role of Natasha Arora.
Ariadna Cabrol portrays the character Nuria in the movie.
Naseeruddin Shah appears as Salman Habib, Imran's biological father, in a special appearance.
In the movie, Deepti Naval essays the character of Rahila Qureshi, who is Imran's mother.
Suhel Seth enacts the role of Natasha's father, Mr. Arora, in the movie.
Concha Montero plays the character Señorita in the movie.
